ygData.subject: Re: Question about dexterity
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard that wisdom actually helps with keeping you from being interrupted.   I dont know if its true but more than one person has said so.    I know once
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard that wisdom actually helps with keeping you from being
interrupted. I dont know if its true but more than one person has said
so. I know once I hit 32 it seemed like my spells go through A LOT
more, my dex is at 93. (I even cast RARELY, when I move back and forth to
stop the accidental casting of a spell)



> to recover from mobs interrupting our spellcasting better? I have heard some
> clerics claim this. I have a dex of 98 and i do find it quite often that even if critters
> hit me HARD i am able to cast a healing spell. I have even gated several times
> out from a heated battle while being hit for a total of 70 dmg.
>
> Just thinking if buying those jewellery craft items that raise dex are worth it :)
>
> Iyenya Goldenheart
> Lvl 27 dwarf cleric
> Innoruuk server
>
